--- title: "RconnectPy Package" date: "last-modified" author: Xinzhuo HUANG categories: [R Package] description: "An R package for easy installation and importing of python modules." code-fold: false feed: true cap-location: bottom --- ```{=html} ``` :::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-8 style="text-align: left;"} ## Overview {.unnumbered .unlisted} An R package for easy installation and importing of python modules. ::: ::: {.g-col-15 .g-col-md-4 style="text-align: center;"}

::: :::: ## Installation ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} remotes::install_github("xinzhuohkust/RconnectPy") ``` ::: ## Usage ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} RconnectPy::where_py() ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} RconnectPy::install_py_packages(python, "pandas") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} packages <- RconnectPy::import_py_packages("pandas", "selenium", "asent") ``` :::
